description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Chicken Pasta with Zucchini and Cherry Tomatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,High protein,High fibre,Tomato,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Cheesy Chicken Pasta with Zucchini and Cherry Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs parmesan, shaved or finely grated (to serve)
3 cloves garlic clove, crushed (save 1 clove for later)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of salted boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain and return to saucepan.

Meanwhile, for the salsa verde, place mint, parsley and garlic in a food processor and process until coarsely chopped. Add lemon rind, juice and olive oil. Process until smooth and thick. Transfer salsa verde to a bowl and season to taste. Cover and refrigerate until required.

Cut each chicken breast in half horizontally. Heat 1 tbs olive oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook chicken in batches, about 4 minutes each side or until just cooked through. Transfer chicken to a plate and shred.

Heat remaining oil in frying pan. Add garlic and zucchini and cook for 8 minutes or until golden. Add chicken stock, cherry tomatoes and half the shredded chicken, reserving half to use later. Cook for 2 minutes or until tomatoes have softened and chicken stock is reduced. Stir in salsa verde. Add cooked pasta and tasty cheese to chicken mixture and toss until well combined. Divide among serving bowls and serve topped with parmesan, with lemon wedges alongside.
